H0.text: In poker, what hand do you have if all your cards are the same suit. Straight Suit

H1.text: In poker, what hand do you have if all your cards are the same suit. Suit Match

H2.text: In poker, what hand do you have if all your cards are the same suit. Uniform Hand

H3.text: In poker, what hand do you have if all your cards are the same suit. Flush

A4.text: A flush is a hand that contains five cards all of the same suit, not all of sequential rank, such as K♣ 10♣ 7♣ 6♣ 4♣ (a 'king-high flush' or a 'king-ten-high flush')
